Metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8681 affecting package libdwarf for versions less than 0.9.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2016-8681 affecting package libdwarf for versions less than 0.9.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libdwarf is earlier than 0.9.0-1, affected by CVE-2016-8681
